item.title: Bob add a quote by Emma Goldman
item.description: "If I can't dance to it, it's not my revolution." -- Emma Goldman

item.title: Bob add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Bob add a quote by mark twain
item.description: "Reader, suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a member of Congress. But I repeat myself." -- mark twain

item.title: Bob add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "You're not to be so blind with patriotism that you can't face reality. Wrong is wrong, no matter who does it or says it." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Bob add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "The last thing I ever wanted was to be alive when the three most powerful people on the whole planet would be named Bush, Dick and Colon." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Bob add a quote by Hillary Rodham Clinton
item.description: "If I want to knock a story off the front page, I just change my hairstyle." -- Hillary Rodham Clinton

item.title: Bob add a quote by Robert Orben
item.description: "Illegal aliens have always been a problem in the United States. Ask any Indian." -- Robert Orben

item.title: Bob add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Those who dance are considered insane by those who cannot hear the music." -- George Carlin

item.title: Bob add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I just can't listen to any more Wagner, you know...I'm starting to get the urge to conquer Poland." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Bob add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Bob add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Jazz isn't dead. It just smells funny." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Bob add a quote by Clarence Page
item.description: "It does no service to the cause of racial equality for white people to content themselves with judging themselves to be nonracist. Few people outside the clan or skinhead movements own up to all-out racism these days. White people must take the extra step. They must become anti-racist." -- Clarence Page

item.title: Bob add a quote by Utah Phillips
item.description: "The state can't give you freedom, and the state can't take it away. You're born with it, like your eyes, like your ears. Freedom is something you assume, then you wait for someone to try to take it away. The degree to which you resist is the degree to which you are free..." -- Utah Phillips

item.title: Bob add a quote by Shane MacGowan
item.description: "People are talking about immigration, emigration and the rest of the fucking thing. It's all fucking crap. We're all human beings, we're all mammals, we're all rocks, plants, rivers. Fucking borders are just such a pain in the fucking arse." -- Shane MacGowan
